function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through mobile technology usage in healthcare and social settings","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and higher risk of infection for individuals","Mitigation":"Strict hygiene protocols, regular disinfection of devices, and promoting awareness about responsible usage","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, contactless devices, and remote monitoring systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and individuals in social settings","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, technology developers, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Reliance on mobile technology for healthcare may lead to data breaches and privacy concerns","Impact":"Compromised patient data, identity theft, and loss of trust in healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Encryption of data, regular security assessments, and compliance with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Secure data transmission systems, encryption software, and biometric authentication","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and technology administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies, and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Potential overload of healthcare systems due to increased reliance on mobile technology for diagnosis and treatment","Impact":"Strain on healthcare facilities, delayed care for non-urgent cases, and increased risk of disease transmission in crowded settings","Mitigation":"Investment in telemedicine infrastructure, remote monitoring solutions, and capacity expansion of healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring devices, and predictive analytics systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and healthcare administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government healthcare agencies, and technology vendors"}]}
